channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2024061138
item.description:
Report X-2024061138

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-20T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-13
  • City: WATERVILLE
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: EMPLOYEE REPORTED TO SUPERVISOR THAT THE BUCKET IN THE PACKAGE CAR SHE WAS LOADING HAD CRACKED ON THE BOTTOM. HAZMAT RESPONDER WAS CALLED AND AFTER DONNING PROTECTIVE GEAR HE WENT TO THE PACKAGE CAR WITH SODIUM BICARBONATE AND CLEANED IT UP.
